definition: not differentiated, clothing of distinctive design worn by members of a particular group as a means of identification, provide with uniforms
details:
adjective
- not differentiated
= synonyms: undifferentiated
- the same throughout in structure or composition
= synonyms: consistent
- evenly spaced
= example: evenly spaced
- always the same
= synonyms: unvarying
noun
- clothing of distinctive design worn by members of a particular group as a means of identification
verb
- provide with uniforms
= example: provide with uniforms
